definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: All the best allies to Yaka must be proven in the furnace of affliction.
sentences.chinese: 凡是雅卡的盟友都必须在战火的熔炉里接受试炼。

sentences.english: He was tried that his godliness might be confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 他受试炼，是为要证实他的敬虔。

sentences.english: as fire tries gold, so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.chinese: 正如烈火试炼真金，逆境试炼人的美德。

sentences.english: as fire tries gold, so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.chinese: 正如烈火试炼真金，逆境试炼人的美德。

sentences.english: Trials drive us to our knees, where we ask for God's help and intervention.
sentences.chinese: 试炼可以令我们在神面前屈膝，求祂帮助和介入。

sentences.english: Remember that we have no more faith at any time than we have in the hour of trial.
sentences.chinese: 在受试炼的时候，我们的信心最大。

sentences.english: Trials may come, yet I'll not fear.
The rapid succession of trials is one of the sorest tests of faith.
sentences.chinese: 这些接二连三的试炼，是对我们信心的考验。

sentences.english: Through the leaves of every trial there are chinks of light to shine through.
sentences.chinese: 试炼虽然围困我们，仍有许多隙缝可以透光进来的。

sentences.english: In the sorest trials God often makes the sweetest discoveries of Himself.
sentences.chinese: 在最痛的试炼中，上帝常给你他的最甜。

sentences.english: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise
sentences.chinese: 看似痛苦的试炼的往往是伪装的祝福。

sentences.english: In the sorest trials God often makes the sweetest discoveries of Himself. --Gems.
sentences.chinese: 在最痛的试炼中，神常给你们的最甜。

sentences.english: Grace for the trials, help from above, Unfailing sympathy, undying love.
sentences.chinese: 试炼得恩助，危难有赖，无限的体谅，不死的爱。

sentences.english: Rehgar has brought in what looks like a twenty-foot orc to test his team.
sentences.chinese: 雷加带来了一个20英尺左右的兽人来试炼他的步队。

sentences.english: Peter says in verse 7 that trials are like a particular kind of fire.
sentences.chinese: 彼得在第7节指出，试炼就像火的试验。

sentences.english: Trials are the food of faith.
